query.prompt:
For each row in the table, look up the etymology of the word. In the "Derived" column, write Latin, Greek, Germanic, etc. In the "Etymology" column, fill in the corresponding word in Greek, Latin, or others, but leave blank if unknown. Provide only the etymology table without any additional explanations or commentary outside the table.
| Italian | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | in+il | | | | mezzo | | | | di+il | | | | cammino | | | | di | | | | nostro | | | | vita | | | | io | | | | ritrovare | | | | per | | | | uno | | | | selva | | | | oscuro | | | | che | | | | la | | | | diritto | | | | via | | | | essere | | | | smarrire | | |
query.result: | Italian | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | in+il | Latin | ille | | mezzo | Germanic | \*middil | | di+il | Latin | ille | | cammino | Latin | campus | | di | Latin | de | | nostro | Latin | noster | | vita | Latin | vita | | io | Latin | ego | | ritrovare | Latin | retro + trovare | | per | Latin | per | | uno | Latin | unus | | selva | Latin | silva | | oscuro | Latin | obscurus | | che | Latin | quae | | la | Latin | illa | | diritto | Latin | directus | | via | Latin | via | | essere | Germanic | \*wes- | | smarrire | Germanic | \*mazza- |
